version

Return the current software version

Try this request in your browser

/api/ /meta/version

Headers

X-Auth-Application
X-Auth-Token 

The request output will be shown here...

URL

/api/v1/meta/version

Access

Must be authenticated with a valid user API token. If not authorised, a NotAuthenticated error will be returned.

Parameters

This action doesn't support any parameters.

Errors

There are no action-specific errors which can be raised.

Response Data

This action will return a String.
